messages.subject: Samurai Williams
messages.msgSnippet: Has anyone read this book?  Samurai William By Giles Milton.  You ve seen the movie Shogun ?  Well, this is about the real William Adams known as Anjin-san .
messages.messageBody:
Has anyone read this book? Samurai William
By Giles Milton. You've seen the movie "Shogun"? Well, this is about the real William Adams known as "Anjin-san". Very interesting! Lots of things that I didn't realize...
Anyone else read anything that I might have missed?...
